bio:
Lokil, a Nord man, is a vampire encountered inside Dimhollow Crypt. He is in charge of a Volkihar vampire small search party looking for a mysterious vampire artifact.
He can be found in the main chamber of Dimhollow Crypt, interrogating Vigilant Adalvald. Lokil just killed Adalvald after he refuseds to help him unlock the tomb that houses the vampire artifact.
Quotes:
"That Vigilant knew nothing. He served his purpose by leading us to this place. Now it is up to us to bring Harkon the prize. And we will not return without it. Vingalmo and Orthjolf will make way for me after this."
"I never forget who my friends are. Or my enemies."
name: Lokil
